items.title: Trump Shields Disinformation And Censors Health Data. It Will Affect You
items.description: HHS websites and the health data they contain are essential sources of public information. They should be free of political interference.

items.title: Actors, Authors And Other Celebrities Who Published Science Papers
items.description: As of last month, George R.R. Martin joins a growing list of authors, actors and musicians who have published scientific research papers.
